text.div:
BC BreastCancerTypeVS ValueSet

Histologic types of breast cancer. Codes are drawn from Snomed. Correspondence to ICD-O-3 is specified. Local codes are used where Snomed codes are currently unavailable.

name: BreastCancerTypeVS
title: BC BreastCancerTypeVS ValueSet
publisher: The HL7 Cancer Interoperability Group sponsored by Clinical Interoperability Council Work Group (CIC)
description: Histologic types of breast cancer. Codes are drawn from Snomed. Correspondence to ICD-O-3 is specified. Local codes are used where Snomed codes are currently unavailable.

concept.display: Malignant neoplasm, primary (morphologic abnormality)
Carcinoma in situ (morphologic abnormality) - corresponds to ICDO3#8010 Carcinoma, NOS
Spindle cell carcinoma (morphologic abnormality)- corresponds to ICDO3#8032 Spindle cell carcinoma
Carcinoma with osteoclast-like giant cells (morphologic abnormality)- corresponds to ICDO3#8035 Carcinoma with osteoclast-like stromal giant cells
Small cell carcinoma (morphologic abnormality)- corresponds to ICDO3#8041 Neuroendocrine carcinoma, poorly differentiated (small cell carcinoma)
Squamous cell carcinoma in situ (morphologic abnormality)- corresponds to ICDO3#8070 Squamous cell carcinoma
Adenocarcinoma, no subtype (morphologic abnormality)- corresponds to ICDO3#8140 Adenocarcinoma, N
Adenoid cystic carcinoma (morphologic abnormality)- corresponds to ICDO3#8200 Adenoid cystic carcinoma
Cribriform carcinoma (morphologic abnormality)- corresponds to ICDO3#8201 Cribriform carcinoma
Tubular adenoma (morphologic abnormality)- corresponds to ICDO3#8211 Tubular carcinoma
Neuroendocrine carcinoma (morphologic abnormality)- corresponds to ICDO3#8246 Neuroendocrine tumor, well-differentiated
Adenocarcinoma with mixed subtypes (morphologic abnormality)- corresponds to ICDO3#8255 Adenocarcinoma with mixed subtypes
Oxyphilic adenoma (morphologic abnormality)- corresponds to ICDO3#8290 Oncocytic carcinoma
Lipid-rich carcinoma (morphologic abnormality)- corresponds to ICDO3#8314 Lipid-rich carcinoma
Glycogen-rich carcinoma (morphologic abnormality)- corresponds to ICDO3#8315 Glycogen-rich clear cell carcinoma
Apocrine adenoma (morphologic abnormality)- corresponds to ICDO3#8401 Apocrine adenocarcinoma
Sebaceous adenoma (morphologic abnormality)- corresponds to ICDO3#8410 Sebaceous carcinoma
Mucoepidermoid tumor (morphologic abnormality)- corresponds to ICDO3#8430 Mucoepidermoid carcinoma
Mucinous adenoma (morphologic abnormality)- corresponds to ICDO3#8480 Mucinous carcinoma
Intraductal carcinoma, noninfiltrating (morphologic abnormality)- corresponds to ICDO3#8500 Ductal carcinoma
Comedocarcinoma (morphologic abnormality)- corresponds to ICDO3#8501 Comedocarcinoma, NOS
Juvenile carcinoma of the breast (morphologic abnormality)- corresponds to ICDO3#8502 Secretory carcinoma
Noninfiltrating intraductal papillary adenocarcinoma (morphologic abnormality)- corresponds to ICDO3#8503 Intraductal papillary carcinoma
Intracystic papillary adenoma (morphologic abnormality)- corresponds to ICDO3#8504 Encapsulated papillary carcinoma
Intraductal micropapillary carcinoma (morphologic abnormality)- corresponds to ICDO3#8507 Invasive micropapillary carcinoma
Papillary carcinoma, solid (morphologic abnormality)- corresponds to ICDO3#8509 Solid papillary carcinoma
Medullary carcinoma (morphologic abnormality)- corresponds to ICDO3#8510 Medullary carcinoma
Atypical medullary carcinoma (morphologic abnormality)- corresponds to ICDO3#8513 Atypical medullary carcinoma
Infiltrating ductular carcinoma (morphologic abnormality)- corresponds to ICDO3#8520 Invasive lobular carcinoma
Infiltrating duct and lobular carcinoma (morphologic abnormality)- corresponds to ICDO3#8521 Infiltrating ductular carcinoma
Infiltrating duct mixed with other types of carcinoma (morphologic abnormality)- corresponds to ICDO3#8522 Infiltrating duct and lobular carcinoma
Infiltrating lobular mixed with other types of carcinoma (morphologic abnormality)- corresponds to ICDO3#8524 Infiltrating lobular mixed with other types of carcinoma
Polymorphous low grade adenocarcinoma (morphologic abnormality)- corresponds to ICDO3#8525 Polymorphous carcinoma
Inflammatory carcinoma (morphologic abnormality)- corresponds to ICDO3#8530 Inflammatory carcinoma
Paget's disease, mammary (morphologic abnormality)- corresponds to ICDO3#8540 Paget disease of the nipple
Paget's disease and infiltrating duct carcinoma of breast (morphologic abnormality)- corresponds to ICDO3#8541 Paget disease and infiltrating duct carcinoma of breast
Paget's disease and intraductal carcinoma of breast (morphologic abnormality)- corresponds to ICDO3#8543 Paget disease and intraductal carcinoma
Adenocarcinoma with squamous metaplasia (morphologic abnormality)- corresponds to ICDO3#8570 Low-grade adenosquamous carcinoma
Fibromatosis-like metaplastic carcinoma (morphologic abnormality)- corresponds to ICDO3#8572 Fibromatosis-like metaplastic carcinoma
Adenocarcinoma with neuroendocrine differentiation (morphologic abnormality)- corresponds to ICDO3#8574 Carcinoma with neuroendocrine differentiation
Metaplastic carcinoma (morphologic abnormality)- corresponds to ICDO3#8575 Metaplastic carcinoma
Myoepithelioma (morphologic abnormality)- corresponds to ICDO3#8982 Myoepithelial carcinoma
Adenomyoepithelioma (morphologic abnormality)- corresponds to ICDO3#8983 Adenomyoepithelioma with carcinoma
Metaplastic carcinoma with mesenchymal differentiation- corresponds to ICDO3#8571 Metaplastic carcinoma with mesenchymal differentiation
